title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 124 - Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 124 - Hearings

State Regulations
§ 124.1 - General procedure; opening statement
§ 124.2 - Right to representation and to remain silent
§ 124.3 - Consolidation of charges
§ 124.4 - Conduct of hearing; procedure; recusal
§ 124.5 - Rules of evidence
§ 124.6 - Post-hearing procedure
§ 124.7 - Penalties
§ 124.8 - Motorist's failure to appear for hearing
§ 124.9 - Police officer's failure to appear for hearing
§ 124.10 - Request for a rescheduled hearing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. I, pt. 124

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 225, 227[1], 504;State Administrative Procedure Act, §
301-3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
